summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3081, for the improvement of 11th Avenue Northwest, from the existing sewer in West 65th Street to West 85th street, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 37433 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
